subject: Pro x ultra pedals on WS
description_text:
Hello dear support,
I have come here to ask, if the simsonn pro x ultra pedals will fit on the
gtomega apex wheelstand.
Sincerely Linus.

conversations.body_text: Hi Linus Mohr,     Yes, it’s supported. You’ll just need the baseplate, and add two 2020 aluminum profiles to extend/reinforce the mounting.

Hello support,
I have to ask here, how long the screws are, that connects the baseplate to
the aluminium profiles.
Sincerely Linus.

support@simsonn.com
Hi Linus Mohr,  Either M6×8 or M6×10 is fine — both sizes will work for installation.
